sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '40', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_STND_DEGR', 3, '개정차수 ', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_MATL_SEQ0', 4, '재료SEQ', 'NUMBER', '5', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_MATL_GUBN', 5, '재료구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_HOSE_CODE', 6, 'HOSE종류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_INJT_CODE', 7, '압출방법', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_SHAP_CODE', 8, '제품형상', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_IN00_CODE', 9, '재질종류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_SPNG_YN', 10, 'SPONGE PAD 유무', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_BARC_CODE', 11, 'BAR CODE', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_NET0_MIN0', 12, 'NET길이 MIN', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_NET0_MAX0', 13, 'NET길이 MAX', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_MATL_NAME', 14, '재료명', 'VARCHAR', '50', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_MATL_PRIC', 15, '단가', 'NUMBER', '14,6', 'R', '100', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_MATL_UNIT', 16, '단위', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_USE0_WEGT', 17, '사용량', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_USE0_COEF1', 18, '사용량계수', 'NUMBER', '20,6', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_APPL_GUBN', 19, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '40', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_REMK', 20, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_UPDT_CMAN', 21, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_UPDT_DATE', 22, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_INIT_CMAN', 23, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSM', 'HOSM_INIT_DATE', 24, '등록일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 18:44:55', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBHOSM ( HOSM_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,HOSM_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSM_STND_DEGR VARCHAR2(10) ,HOSM_MATL_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,HOSM_MATL_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_HOSE_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_INJT_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_SHAP_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_IN00_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_SPNG_YN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_BARC_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_NET0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSM_NET0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSM_MATL_NAME VARCHAR2(50) ,HOSM_MATL_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6) ,HOSM_MATL_UNIT VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_USE0_WEGT NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSM_USE0_COEF1 NUMBER(20, 6) ,HOSM_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSM_REMK VARCHAR2(200) ,HOSM_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSM_INIT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBHOSM_PK PRIMARY KEY(
) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
